content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-85 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (39.0,-85.0), (37.0,-85.0)
- Storage chest at (40.5,-87.5) collecting coal from drill (41.0,-86.0)
- Storage chest at (39.5,-83.5) collecting coal from drill (39.0,-85.0)
- Storage chest at (36.5,-86.5) collecting coal from drill (37.0,-85.0)
- Inserter network connecting drills to chests

### Iron/Copper Mining Complex at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0)
- Storage chest at (-27.5,-59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0)
- Inserter system moving ore from chest to furnace
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) collecting plates

### Iron Ore Processing Line at position(x=0-6, y=0)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Inserter network feeding ore and collecting plates

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17-27)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric poles distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Issues
- Keep mining drills fueled to prevent work stoppages
- Ensure boilers have constant fuel supply to maintain power generation

### Transport Belt Issues
- Clear blocked transport belts to prevent backup in production lines
- Ensure proper belt connections between components

### Inserter Placement Issues
- Verify inserters have valid pickup and drop positions
- Check that inserters can reach both source and destination entities

### Fluid System Issues
- Ensure proper pipe connections between water pump, boiler and steam engine
- Verify fluid flow direction in pipe networks
